album.name: Pancake Day 2002
album.description: Hey, it's traditional now... We had our first pancake party as a house warming when I moved into the studio flat in Ealing (in around 1996). We've had them most years since then. This years was a bit quieter with just Paul, Tess and James.

image.caption: Blur!
image.description: I think the camera moved a bit too much - sorry Tess! Still, it stays as I quite like the effect.

image.caption: Paul in charge
image.description: Paul took a turn with the pancake making

image.caption: Jane and Paul
image.description: Not sure why I'm pulling such a face!

image.caption: James and the white rabbit!
image.description: This is a rabbit I bought for Rich for Christmas, it's motorised and hops around the room

image.caption: Jamie playing
image.description: James was playing with his shape sorter
